parameter: Freedom of association and fair representation
definition: The policy mentions workers' ability to organize, join unions, or participate in collective decision-making.
The policy includes reference to protections against health and safety risks, mental or physical

The policy mentions worker wages, discusses insufficient wages, or prescribes an acceptable wage. It may also address issues like naming tasks that must be compensated, the currency or form of payment, the frequency of payment, etc.
The policy mentions flexibility, worker control, or restrictions on employer-set schedules.
The policy outlines processes, procedures, or rules for worker removal, deactivation from a platform, or suspension or termination processes.
The policy mentions protections against arbitrary dismissal or guarantees of continued employment.

parameter: Channels for workers to appeal decisions, raise complaints, seek clarification
definition: The policy includes references to grievance procedures or mechanisms for resolving disputes, such as the ability to appeal a work decision, raise complaints or seek clarification.

parameter: Identifying risks and harms to workers
definition: The policy recommends that employers disclose potential or anticipated risks or harms, material or immaterial, that employees may encounter or expose themselves to on the job.

parameter: Evaluation metrics, productivity standards and quotas
definition: The policy recommends acceptable methods for measurement of worker performance, productivity benchmarks, or quotas.
The policy mentions health coverage for workers, mental or physical.
